data.name: Table Ball - Colours DLC 2
data.detailed_description:
Custom Colours DLC 2

Do you want to customise your bumpers and balls?

WELL NOW YOU CAN

Features

New Colours
4 new colours to choose from.
Wanting a nice magenta ball? Well you can have that.
Want your bumpers to be cyan? You can do that too
Want your bumpers to be yellow while your ball is coral red? OF COURSE YOU CAN.

What colours are included?

Magenta, Cyan, Yellow, Coral Red

data.short_description: The Table Ball - Colours DLC 2 adds four different colours that can be used to customise your Table Ball experience. Make your bumpers and balls magenta, cyan, yellow or coral red, it's all up to you in the Table Ball Colours DLC 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8145U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Quadro 2000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
